hero.title: Live the charm of 18th-century Essaouira
hero.subtitle: A historic riad with soul — steps from the ramparts and the ocean.

intro.title: Welcome to Essaouira
intro.text: Built in 1871 and lovingly restored, our riad blends discreet elegance with the living heart of a Moroccan patio.

quotes.text: Wonderful location in the heart of the medina. Staff were warm and welcoming.
quotes.author: Anna, UK

quotes.text: The patio is magical at night. Great breakfast and very clean rooms.
quotes.author: Marc, FR

quotes.text: Authentic riad feel with modern comforts. We’ll be back!
quotes.author: Layla, US

concierge.name: Concierge
concierge.desc: Reception staff speaking FR, EN, DE, AR

rooms.title: Rooms & Suites
rooms.subtitle: Each room has its own style, colors and charm — all restored with care to keep the discreet elegance of our 18th-century riad.
rooms.policy3: City tax may apply at the property.

hero.title: Riad Al Madina – Restaurant
hero.subtitle: Meals are served in charming lounges where every detail commands attention. Enjoy traditional or international cuisine, with rigorously selected products.

story.title: Welcome
story.text: Around the patio, our kitchen blends Moroccan classics and market-fresh seafood from Essaouira. The menu follows the seasons and the catch of the day.

cta.bigText: Reserve your table now and enjoy our seasonal kitchen.

menu.title: Lunch Menu
menu.note: Prices in MAD. Please inform us of any allergies.

specials.title: Chef’s Specials
specials.text: Ask about the catch of the day and seasonal tajines. Prices may vary.

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: Questions, booking requests or special arrangements — we’re here to help.

hours.title: Reception & Hours
hours.note: Early check-in or late check-out subject to availability.

faq.title: Good to know
faq.a1: Yes. We can arrange private transfers from Marrakech, Agadir or Essaouira airport. Let us know your flight details.
faq.a2: Breakfast is optional and can be added to your stay. Traditional Moroccan breakfast is served daily.
faq.q3: Can you cater for dietary needs?
faq.a3: Of course. Please tell us about any allergies or preferences — our team will be happy to help.

hero.title: Spa & Wellness
hero.subtitle: Exhale in our traditional hammam, aromatic massages and slow rituals — all in the calm of our riad.

hammam.title: Moroccan Hammam
hammam.text: Our hammam blends steam, black soap and gentle exfoliation for a deep sense of lightness. Your therapist will guide each step so you can completely let go.

treatments.title: Treatments & Prices
treatments.note: Prices in MAD. Kindly inform us of any allergies.

cta.title: Relax, we take care of everything…
cta.text: Book the hammam or a massage in advance — or visit us upon arrival. Treatments are subject to availability.
